layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 11; ruled lines: 27; written lines: 27; Uniform layout. Ruling by hard point, membrane by membrane. Visible stitching of membranes. Three tagin on שעטנזגץ, and on בדהחק. A few majuscular or minuscular letters. The names of the sons of Haman arranged in 11 lines, in accordance with the rule. Wooden roller (485mm high).

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sefardi square script of the 16th century.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Acquired by the British Museum from Rev. Thomas Butler on 05 July 1841: inscribed on verso.
